name: REgenerate (Pixel Force)
description:
Created for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2
  • Design and programming by Ravi
  • Art and sound design by Vijay
  • Music by Dust Breaks

As a scientist, you are tasked with maintaining the generators. Unfortunately, an experiment went wrong! EXPERIMENT 13065 has found a new home within the generator room, feeding off of its power.

Rewind time to repair destroyed generators and walls!

Keyboard Controls
  • Arrow Keys - Move
  • L. Control - Attack
  • L. Alt - Action (Rewind, repair, open, and close)
Gamepad Controls
  • L. Joystick - Move
  • A Button - Attack
  • B Button - Action (Rewind, repair, open, and close)

Special thanks to Hayden, Landon, Cathy, and Harpreet for play testing and feedback!
